00008 // 32 bit color pixel format
00009 #define RGB_ALPHA          0xFF000000
00010 #define RGB_RED            0x00FF0000
00011 #define RGB_GREEN          0x0000FF00
00012 #define RGB_BLUE           0x000000FF
00013

00016 #define CFG_SCR_HEIGHT           "height"
00017 #define CFG_SCR_BPP              "bpp"
00018 #define CFG_SCR_FPS              "fps"
00019 #define CFG_SCR_FPS_LIMIT        "fps_limit"
00020 #define CFG_SCR_MODE             "mode"
00021 #define CFG_SCR_MODE_SW          "software"
00022 #define CFG_SCR_MODE_HW          "hardware"
00023 #define CFG_SCR_TRANSMODE        "transmode"

00025 #define CFG_SCR_TRANSMODE_PPA    "PPA"
00026 #define CFG_SCR_TRANSMODE_PSA    "PSA"
00027 #define CFG_SCR_TRANSMODE_NONE   "NONE"

00030 // Default values
00031 #define DEFAULT_SCR_WIDTH        800
00032 #define DEFAULT_SCR_HEIGHT       600
00033 #define DEFAULT_SCR_BPP          32
00034 #define DEFAULT_SCR_FPS          15
00035 #define DEFAULT_SCR_FPS_LIMIT    1
00036 #define DEFAULT_SCR_MODE         SDL_SWSURFACE
00037 #define DEFAULT_SCR_TRANSMODE    PPA
00038 #define DEFAULT_SCR_CK_R         0xFF
00039 #define DEFAULT_SCR_CK_G         0x00
00040 #define DEFAULT_SCR_CK_B         0xFF

00048 enum TMode { NONE = 0, CK, PPA, PSA };
00049 
00054 class _Config
00055 {
00056    public:
00061       _Config();
00062       ~_Config();
00063 
00064       /* Screen properties */
00066       inline uint  SCR_Width()    { return m_scr_width; }
00068       inline uint  SCR_Height()   { return m_scr_height; }
00070       inline uint  SCR_BPP()      { return m_scr_bpp; }
00072       inline uint  SCR_FPS()      { return m_scr_fps; }
00074       inline uint  SCR_FPSLimit() { return m_scr_fps_limit; }
00076       inline uint  SCR_Mode()     { return m_scr_mode; }
00080       inline TMode SCR_TMode()    { return m_scr_tmode; }
00082       inline uint  SCR_ColorKey(SDL_Surface* s)
00083       {
00084          return SDL_MapRGB(s->format, m_scr_ck_r, m_scr_ck_g, m_scr_ck_b);
00085       }
00087       inline uint  RGB_Alpha()    { return (m_scr_tmode == PPA) ? RGB_ALPHA : 0; }
00088 
00089    private:
00090       _Config(const _Config&);
00091       const _Config& operator=(const _Config&);
00092 
00093       uint  m_scr_width;
00094       uint  m_scr_height;
00095       uint  m_scr_bpp;
00096       uint  m_scr_fps;
00097       uint  m_scr_fps_limit;
00098       uint  m_scr_mode;
00099       TMode m_scr_tmode;
00100       uint  m_scr_ck_r;
00101       uint  m_scr_ck_g;
00102       uint  m_scr_ck_b;
00103 };
